snippet.title: Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance - Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance is now released!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2299430/Shinogi_Chess_Club_2_Resistance/

After the Spring Championships... the Typhoon Initiative has finally dissolved. Yet still the resistance to change ever marches on when new rebellion groups take a stand against the city's obsession with Shinogi Chess. As student competitor Himiko Masaki continues the search for her mother, her pursuit of answers leads her down a troubling path. When this struggle for the truth turns into conflict, new developments shake Yoshino High School to its core, and the members of the Shinogi Chess Club must adapt to these hardships. 

How will Himiko respond to these issues as the leader of the Shinogi Chess Club? Every move counts in Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance.

Play the original Shinogi Chess Club here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1840060/Shinogi_Chess_Club/

#shinogi #chess #club #anime #visualnovel #visualnovelgames #gamedev #gameart #trailer #indiedev #unity3d #pcgaming #game

The music used in this trailer was composed by me, and will be featured in the game's OST upon release. The full HQ-version of the soundtrack will be available for purchase later in 2023. Made with Unity. 

Be sure to wishlist Shinogi Chess Club 2 as it really helps a ton:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2299430/Shinogi_Chess_Club_2_Resistance/

~~LINKS~~

🐦Keep up with development by following me on Twitter! 
https://twitter.com/RobProductions

🌐I have an official website here!
https://www.robproductionsgames.com/

🎮You can see my previous games here!
https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=RobProductions

📷Check out my concept art and WIP screenshots over on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/robproductionsgames/

🎥Subscribe to the channel for more videos/trailers on Shinogi Chess Club 2 and some looks behind the scenes of my development process! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVRHCqDn1UGPTDYEJKtaMRw
